segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and it’s just getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in it, but she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is soaked, and the floor is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just tired or if she’s ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she has no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while everything is falling apart around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets if it keeps going like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should probably help, but I don’t know where to start.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just too much to handle.
segments.speaker: PAR
